alert.note: Alert for White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 07 at 7:24PM AKDT until October 08 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM AKDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River. * WHEN...Until 10 PM AKDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and blowing snow will develop tonight and continue into Sunday evening. The strongest winds and lowest visibility will be over Steese Highway Summits.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River
